Events that occurred on 10 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letters 287 and 288.
1981 - The tenth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1997 - The second day of Bree Moot 3 in Minneapolis.
2008 - Artist Frank Frazetta dies.
2019 - The biographical film, Tolkien, is released in the United States.
2021 - Houghton Miffin is bought by HarperCollins.
2023 - The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
